content:
Rachel could perform her first solo performance on a festival such as "Natsu Matsuri" (Summer Festival) this festival is held in Tokyo and Osaka, it's known for its focus on Japanese pop music and it features a lineup of well-known and up-and-coming idols and J-pop acts.

Natsu Matsuri is a festival that is known for its festive atmosphere and the diversity of its line-up, it's a great platform for new and upcoming artists to showcase their talents and gain more exposure and recognition. Rachel, as a member of Harmony Hearts, had the opportunity to perform on big stages and with a group, but this solo performance will give her a chance to show her full potential and her unique voice and style. It's also a great opportunity for her to connect with her fans and give them a chance to see her in a different light.
